text: Avarkal mitu telivana nam vacanankal otik kanpikkappattal, nam'mutaiya cantippai nampatavarkal, "itu allata veru oru kur'anai nir kontu varum; allatu itai marrivitum" enru kurukirarkal. Atarku"en manap pokkinpati atai nam marrivita enakku urimaiyillai, en mitu vahiyaka arivikkappatupavarrait tavira veretaiyum nan pinparruvatillai, en iraivanukku nan maru ceytal, makattana nalin vetanaikku (nan alaka ventum enpatai) nan niccayamaka payappatukiren" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
